go_data.justification: Carbachol induces a biphasic increase in intracellular Ca2+ concentration involving a phosphoinositol phospholipase/phosphokinase (PLC/PKC) cascade.
PLC is involved in a phosphoinositol phospholipase/phosphokinase (PLC/PKC) cascade.
PLC-gamma1 associates with microvillar protein villin, suggesting cytoplasmic localization.
